Text: RE Stagecoach Going Forward Cc Looks good to me I have a questioncomment on When we have talked to PPL it was understanding that if you are buying power from the utility it was a soleserve type of arrangement you couldnt buy power on the grid If this is the case is there a way that another Enron affiliate or maybe your wholesale group could perform a swap with the power or the financials to make it look like we are not taking power from the utility and selling it in the market Corey Original Message From mailto Sent Friday January PM To Stringer Alison Cc Goodman Mike Johnson Anders Grindal Corey Towne Paul Hegmann Bret Wallooppillai Ram Lloyd Mike Subject Stagecoach Going Forward Hey all I thought I would put down the steps that need to be done in moving forward with the Stagecoach deal If there is anything I missed please let me know Need to recalculate deal as a year term with updated pricing Need to explore possibility of receiving gas volumes in the Northern Storage facility Understand that storage and withdrawal fees would apply Need to address the supply of power during the summer months of June July and August that would provide maximum optionality for both participants Will explore at least scenarios First a minimum load factor scenario in which power could be interrupted and sold back into the market with Enron and El Paso sharing in the realized margin and second a separate contract that provided El Paso with the ability to call on power when they desire to run the electric compressor during those months This could be the most challenging aspect of the deal so please forward any other ideas or suggestions Need to produce operating bands for load factors and corresponding heat rates This includes exploring a ratcheting demand charge where annual charge could be reduced and operation above a certain load factor would result in pass through charges Once again thanks to all for a very productive and highenergy meeting Lets keep the communication flowing so we can put together the best deal for everyone involved Andrew This email and any files transmitted with it from El Paso Energy Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender
